Description:
Exception is thrown out when double click a chart in an old report design.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070104-13455
eclipse 3.3.0, JDK 1.5

Steps to reproduce:
1. Double click a chart in an old report design.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Exception is thrown out.
